snippet: Labels like Sub Pop, Fool’s Gold and others have made deals with Drip.fm, a subscription streaming service, while musicians like Ryan Hemsworth have started their own services.
abstract: Some independent record labels and their artists are embracing the streaming music revolution, but on their own terms; labels like Sub Pop, Fool’s Gold and others have made deals with Drip.fm, subscription streaming service, while musicians like Ryan Hemsworth have started their own services.
lead_paragraph: Labels like Sub Pop, Fool’s Gold and others have made deals with Drip.fm, a subscription streaming service, while musicians like Ryan Hemsworth have started their own services.

headline.main: Independent Music Labels and Young Artists Offer Streaming, on Their Terms
headline.print_headline: Independent Music Labels and Young Artists Offer Streaming, on Their Terms
